Famous Duos & Teams.name: Dynamic Duos: A Partnership Puzzle
Famous Duos & Teams.description: Test your knowledge of iconic partnerships, from explorers to cartoon characters! This quiz explores the names and relationships of famous duos and teams throughout history and pop culture. Can you identify these legendary collaborations?

questions.text: What were the first names of the early American explorers Lewis and Clark?
questions.hint: Their first names are less common, with one starting with ‘M’ and the other ‘W.’

questions.text: What are the names of the two primary M&M's spokes-candies?
questions.hint: These names refer to the colors of the candies, not their flavors.

questions.text: What are the names of Donald Duck's three nephews?
questions.hint: Their names are rhyming and often listed together in Disney cartoons.

questions.text: What are the Smothers Brothers' first names?
questions.hint: These names are short and classic, fitting for a comedic duo.

questions.text: What are the names of the two primary M&M's spokes-candies?
questions.hint: These names refer to the colors of the candies, not their flavors.

questions.text: How are actors Charlie Sheen and Emilio Estevez related?
questions.hint: They share the same parents and grew up in a famous acting family.

questions.text: Who is the twin sister of 'Dear Abby' columnist Abigail VanBuren?
questions.hint: This advice columnist used a different pen name but shared a similar style.
